text: Andrei Kovalenko (born 1970) is a Russian ice hockey player. Andrei Kovalenko may also refer to: *Andrei Kovalenko (Belarusian footballer) (born 1970), Belarusian footballer *Andrei Kovalenko (Russian footballer) (born 1972), Russian football coach and player *Andrei Kovalenko (water polo) (born 1970), Australian water polo player and coach
title: Andrei Kovalenko (disambiguation)
